title: FS: T213 Type 2 Roger Bresnahan PSA 4 - SOLD

posts.post_title: FS: T213 Type 2 Roger Bresnahan PSA 4 - SOLD
posts.post_content:
SOLD: This is becoming a reverse auction! Very nice card of Bresnahan with no creasing, scuffing, etc. Residing in a new PSA holder, this one might even be a bit undergraded. Now asking [STRIKE]$450[/STRIKE] $350 net, delivered. PayPal preferred, but flexible to other purchasing methods.
